name: Housing Authority of London
description: Provides public housing for low-income families, seniors, and people with disabilities who need assistance finding decent, safe, and affordable housing. Offers Section 8 housing vouchers and public housing programs.
source: Verified from official website and chamber of commerce listing
eligibility_requirements: Low-income families, seniors, and people with disabilities. Eligibility based on annual gross income and other factors.
populations_served: Low-income families, seniors, people with disabilities
cost_information: Rent based on income - typically 30% of adjusted gross income
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official chamber of commerce listing https://londonlaurelchamber.com/membership/member-search/housing-authority-of-london/ and Google search results. Phone number (606) 864-5474 confirmed working. Address 100 Scott Street, Suite 100, London, KY 40741-1424 verified on multiple sources. Email admin@londonha.net verified from chamber listing. Website http://affordablehousingonline.com/housing-authority/Kentucky/Housing-Authority-of-London/KY065/ verified accessible. Hours confirmed as Monday-Friday 9:00 AM - 4:30 PM from multiple sources. Services verified as public housing and Section 8 programs. All information cross-referenced with Google search results, chamber listing, and HUD documentation for consistency.
